member.name: M:VoyagesApi.Controllers.VoyagesController.GetAveragePrice(System.String,VoyagesApi.Models.Currency)
member.summary: Returns the average of the last 10 prices for the specified voyage code in the specified currency

member.name: M:VoyagesApi.Controllers.VoyagesController.UpdatePrice(System.String,System.Decimal,VoyagesApi.Models.Currency,System.DateTimeOffset)
member.summary: Adds a new record with the specified price, currency and timestamp for the voyage
